reference.shortdesc: The ditavalmeta element defines metadata that is associated with a DITAVAL document used for one branch of a map.

refbody.section: Use the ditavalmeta to specify the prefixes and suffixes that processors use to construct effective resource names and key scope names within the map branch. The ditavalmeta element also can contain other information, such as navigation title, that might be useful for map architects but is not rendered in the output.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The ditavalmeta element is specialized from . It is defined in the DITAVALref domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: (except for conkeyref, which is removed for all elements in this domain).
